weekly picks (Apr 1 week 2023)

Posted on March 28, 2023 in 2023apr,  Daily t.me,  adsabs,  g scholar

A WordCloud of 2023 Apr 1st week collection

  1. 2303.16029 Twisted cuprate van der Waals heterostructures with controlled Josephson coupling (arXiv.org)

  2. 2303.15912 Angle-dependent Magnetoresistance of an Ordered Bose Glass of Vortices in YBa${2}$Cu${3}$O$_{7-\delta}$ Thin Films with a Periodic Pinning~Lattice (arXiv.org)

  3. 2303.15622 Structure, Stability and Superconductivity of N-doped Lutetium Hydrides at kbar Pressures (arXiv.org)

  4. 2303.15551 Electron-K-Phonon Interaction In Twisted Bilayer Graphene (arXiv.org)

  5. 2303.15504 Towards a Ginzburg-Landau theory of the quantum geometric effect in superconductors (arXiv.org)

  6. 2303.15820 Flat-band ferromagnetism in the SU($N$) Hubbard and Kondo lattice models (Katsura, arXiv.org)

  7. 2303.15751 A baby-Skyrme model with the anisotropic DM interaction: the compact skyrmions revisited (arXiv.org)

  8. PhysRevLett.130.136002 Triplet Pairing Mechanisms from Hund’s-Kondo Models: Applications to ${\mathrm{UTe}}{2}$ and ${\mathrm{CeRh}}{2}{\mathrm{As}}_{2}$ (PRL)

  9. 2303.14673 Type III superconductivity (arXiv)

  10. 2303.14236 Andreev reflection in altermagnets (arXiv)

  11. 2303.15432 Visualizing the atomic-scale origin of metallic behavior in Kondo insulators (arXiv)

  12. 2303.15398 Switching the Magnetization in Quantum Antiferromagnets (arXiv)

  13. 2303.15358 Comprehensive mean-field analysis of magnetic and charge orders in the two-dimensional Hubbard mode (arXiv)

  14. 2303.14973 Optical transitions of a single nodal ring in SrAs$_3$: radially and axially resolved characterization (nodal ring, arXiv)

  15. 2303.14627 Symmetry analysis of light-induced magnetic interactions via Floquet engineering (Hayami, arXiv)

  16. 2303.14903 Strong Inter-valley Electron-Phonon Coupling in Magic-Angle Twisted Bilayer Graphene (arXiv)

  17. 2303.15283 Controlling magnetic skyrmion nucleation with Ga+ ion irradiation (arXiv)

  18. 2303.14853 Homochiral antiferromagnetic merons, antimerons and bimerons realized in synthetic antiferromagnets (arXiv)

  19. 2303.14843 Compact localised states in magnonic Lieb lattices (arXiv)

  20. 2303.14794 Anomalous open orbits in Hofstadter spectrum of Chern insulator (arXiv)

  21. 2303.14635 Kerr, Faraday, and Magnetoelectric Effects in MnBi$_2$Te$_4$ Thin Films (MacDonald, arXiv)

  22. PhysRevX.13.011046 Direct Observation of Quantum Anomalous Vortex in Fe(Se,Te) (PRX)

  23. 47 Superconducting Vortices Made Without Magnetic Fields (Physics)

  24. 2303.13704 Two-fold symmetric superconductivity in the kagome superconductor RbV3Sb5 (kagome, arXiv)

  25. 2303.13910 Effects of orbital selective dynamical correlation on the spin susceptibility and superconducting symmetries in Sr$_2$RuO$_4$ (arXiv)

  26. 2303.14034 Effect of nitrogen doping and pressure on the stability of cubic LuH$_3$ (LuH3, arXiv)

  27. 2303.13578 Magnetism and Metallicity in Moir\‘e Transition Metal Dichalcogenides (arXiv)

  28. 2303.13602 Electron-phonon coupling and competing Kekul\‘e orders in twisted bilayer graphene (arXiv)

  29. 2303.13708 Enhancement of Charge Density Wave Correlations in a Holstein Model with an Anharmonic Phonon Potential (Anharmonic Phonon, arXiv)

  30. 2303.13999 Near coincidence of metal-insulator transition and quantum critical fluctuations: Electronic ground state and magnetic order in Fe${1-x}$Co${x}$Si (arXiv)
